title: Tenacious D's Fenix rizes with SoundCloud
description: This is not The Greatest Website in the World, no. This is just a tribute. I was approached by Tenacious D a week ago with an incredible quest: raising a phallus shaped phoenix onto the internet (oh and the first clip of audio from their new record.) How could I raise this majestic beast with the power of SoundCloudâ€™s legendary API? The answer was simple: Have the sound itself rize the phoenix from its ashes.
